JobTitle: Technical Program Manager, VR System Navigation
JobFullDesc: The Facebook Reality Labs (FRL) team is developing future products in augmented reality and virtual reality that will enable groundbreaking experiences for consumers and businesses. We are hiring for an experienced Technical Program Manager to lead System Navigation programs on the VR Platform Core Software development team. Core Software is a broad collection of cross-functional teams across infrastructure and front-end system work, all contributing to the end user experience of our VR headsets. The TPM role is key to coordinating efforts and driving impact across various functions and stakeholders, including Product, Engineering, Design, QA, and more, to drive feature quality and execution from concept to release.In this role, we are looking for individuals with broad experience in software development and program management to lead System Navigation initiatives for the current and future generation VR devices. The System Navigation team builds and improves system-level features that help users more quickly access and efficiently navigate to their favorite VR experiences. The TPM will establish requirements with the internal team as well as cross-functional partners and dependent teams, manage program schedules, identify risks and associated mitigation plans, and clearly communicate to program stakeholders.
